name.jp: ジャイアント・マッシュポワ召喚のオーブ
name.vi: Quả cầu triệu hồi nấm khổng lồ

description.en: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.br: Irá invocar um Mushpoie Gigante. Para usar, clique vezes no item e depois clique no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 允许你召唤一只剧毒的蘑菇人。若要使用，双击并在附近的地面上选择一块区域召唤它。
description.fi: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un Géant Mushpoie pour une heure. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Memungkinkan Anda memanggil Giant Mushpoie. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah terdekat untuk memanggil the Giant.
description.it: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.jp: ジャイアント・マッシュポワを召喚する魔法のオーブ。使用してから召喚したい地面をクリックすると出現します。
description.kr: 거대 머쉬포이를 소환 하는 마법 구슬. 사용하려면 두 번 클릭한 다음 자이언트를 호출할 영역을 선택합니다.
description.nl: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Шар призыва громадного подгрызиновика. Дважды щелкните по шару, а затем укажите место на земле, где должен появиться монстр.
description.sp: Te permite invocar a un Mushpoie Gigante. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarlo.
description.sw: Allows you to summon a Giant Mushpoie. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.th: อนุญาตให้คุณเรียก Giant Mushpoie ในการใช้งาน ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่ที่อยู่ใกล้เคียงเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能召喚菇類大魔王的魔法晶球。要使用，請雙點擊它，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Cho phép bạn triệu hồi Nấm khổng lồ. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất gần đó để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
